ai-anya-e0105n35:1_0: But when asked, how can he answer about the teachers’ teachers?
ai-anya-e0105n35:1_1: Also, understanding what is beneficial and what is connected with the Buddha, the Great Elders, and the grand-daughter of the three sections of the Abhidhamma, the great teacher, and of the Videhans, namely, the Mahātittha (King Laṅkā). It was because of the three sections of the paths, the Elder Mahādeva, the Great Monastery, and the Elder Mahā Kassapa.
ai-anya-e0105n35:1_2: There is no distinction between in this sort and that.
ai-anya-e0105n35:1_3: Which is said in the Himalaya:
ai-anya-e0105n35:2_0: “For he who has long gone to live in this hermitage,
ai-anya-e0105n35:3_0: having now come, when I asked the Elders,
ai-anya-e0105n35:4_0: One who is undisturbed, with purity and mindfulness,
ai-anya-e0105n35:5_0: Just so the Buddha with good minds,
ai-anya-e0105n35:6_0: One who understands the great sages of men and women,
ai-anya-e0105n35:8_0: a great deal of conduct by thought occurred to him.
ai-anya-e0105n35:9_0: Today is the golden powder’s gold,
ai-anya-e0105n35:10_0: The residents of the Mahāvihāra monastery
ai-anya-e0105n35:11_0: I would accept it from you if you would give me your communion.”
ai-anya-e0105n35:12_0: That is how the teacher of a teacher, bringing back the way beginning, “Buddha, go to heaven” is explained by this point in detailed explanation of the Path.
